thread.title: RubyWorld Conference 2015 Set for Nov. 12-13; Registration Available Until Oct. 16
thread.title_full: RubyWorld Conference 2015 Set for Nov. 12-13; Registration Available Until Oct. 16

title: RubyWorld Conference 2015 Set for Nov. 12-13; Registration Available Until Oct. 16
text:
RubyWorld Conference 2015 Set for Nov. 12-13; Registration Available Until Oct. 16 [October 08, 2015] Tweet 
MATSUE, Japan , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The RubyWorld Conference Executive Committee will hold this year's biggest business conference in Japan RWC 2015 on November 12-13 . 
In February 2013 , the programming language "Ruby" marked 20 years since its development, coinciding with the release of Ruby 2.0. 
Through this year's seventh RubyWorld Conference, Ruby will offer everyone the opportunity to consider ways of penetration as well as the permeation process and growth involved, as it aligns itself with the real world of diversity. 
-RubyWorld Conference 2015- 
November 12 and November 13, 2015 
Venue: 
Shimane Prefectural Convention Center: Kunibiki Messe 
Organizer: 
Executive Committee for RubyWorld Conference 
(Affiliated bodies) 
Ruby Association/ Shimane Prefectural Government/ Matsue Municipal Government/ Shimane University/ Matsue College of Technology/ JETRO Matsue / Shimane Industrial Promotion Foundation/ Shimane Information Technology Industry Association/ Open Source Software Society Shimane/ METI Chugoku Bureau of Economy, Trade and Industry 
Admission:
